result.execSummary:
The defendant Craig Donald Spaude was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 3rd Degree Sexual Assault, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3).
  • 3rd Degree Sexual Assault, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: Not allowed to vote until civil rights are restored.  No contact with victim or her immediately family.  No contact with minor children under the age of 18 except for immediate family and only with approval from agent.

Assessments and counseling as directed by the agent.  Sex offender treatment as recommended by agent.  Comply with all sex offender registry requirements.  Comply with all child sex offender registry requirements.  Court defers restitution at this time.  Submit DNA sample - Court waives surcharge.
